definition: to give as a present/to repel/to bestow an honorary title after death (old)

sentences.english: Donation of 550 wheelchairs at Qinyang, Henan on May 22, 2008.
sentences.chinese: 天邻基金会捐赠550张轮椅河南省沁阳市残疾人士。

sentences.english: This album of painting is a gift since old professor.
sentences.chinese: 这本画集是一位老教授捐赠的。

sentences.english: Begging is to request a donation in a supplicating manner.
sentences.chinese: 乞讨是以请求的方试去要求给予捐赠。

sentences.english: This met the volunteer and to play amain role either by the donation or the participation.
sentences.chinese: 本会志愿者并且充当了一个主要角色或由捐赠或参加。

sentences.english: Some groups try to make donating fun.
sentences.chinese: 有些团体想办法为捐赠活动增添更多的情趣。

sentences.english: What is the endowment of Yale?
sentences.chinese: 耶鲁的捐赠基金是什么？

sentences.english: To travels frequently in China and also abroad, on trips to meet donors.
sentences.chinese: 杜聪在中国和国外频繁穿梭旅行，会见捐赠者。

sentences.english: Ian Teh has donated this photograph taken in Inner Mongolia from the series Traces.
sentences.chinese: 郑永仁从内蒙古痕迹系列捐赠一张照片作是次拍卖。

sentences.english: They simply sign off on the number and type of items donated.
sentences.chinese: 他们只是在捐赠物上简单地标上编号和类型。

sentences.english: The donations, however, represented about 60% of all his campaign money.
sentences.chinese: 可是，捐赠款占他竞选资金的60%。

sentences.english: He subscribed a large amount of money to the collection for the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 他向为医院而募集的款项捐赠了一大笔钱。

sentences.english: Whoever donates archives to the State shall be rewarded by the archives repositories concerned.
sentences.chinese: 向国家捐赠档案的，档案馆应当予以奖励。

sentences.english: Social media sites are another way to make donating easy and fun.
sentences.chinese: 社交媒体网站是另一种使捐赠既便利又有趣的管道。

sentences.english: Funds should respond to the inquiry of donators faithfully and in time.
sentences.chinese: 对于捐赠人的查询，基金会应当及时如实答复。

sentences.english: My mother's food coupons will go to the British Museum as I have promised.
sentences.chinese: 我已经答应把母亲留给我的粮票捐赠给大英博物馆。

definition: to donate money/to contribute funds/donation/contribution (of money)
to donate goods (to a relief effort)/to contribute material
